column4: I've just installed ubuntu 8.10 on my system and is says me I have to install almost 250 mbytes of security updates, is this correct?
fosco_: does ubuntu lists only the updates needed by my system?
yes
thanks
mos of your apt-get will do everything for you, such as autoclean, autoremove and purge
ubuntu 8.10
press Alt Gr the the @ the the a .. what's the output?
not exactly, to get an á I would like to type an acute, then an "a", and only then get the á displayed

what i do myself because i write in Portuguese is, get them from the combination that i gave you like Alt Gr + : the e= é then you can get all the others around it with the same combination from the other keys around it äãáâà
any good?
have you this this layout? I also type in portuguese and I think it is much simpler this way
